definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I also use intensively a seeing pin to add multiple small holes.
sentences.chinese: 我也特意使用錐子在槍身上鑽一些小洞。

sentences.english: Therefore, i order to eliminate drowsiness, Shu Qin kept an awl by his side.
sentences.chinese: 蘇秦爲了驅除睡意，便將一把錐子放在身邊。

sentences.english: If there is a wind, it knifes through your skin like stilettos.
sentences.chinese: 如果有風，也會如錐子一般刺穿你的皮膚。

sentences.english: This is because I show you this awl today.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲我到今天才叫您看到這把錐子。

sentences.english: Again he drove the awl and needle into her.
sentences.chinese: 他便又一次掏出錐子和針，要扎她。

sentences.english: Baba Mustapha was seated with an awl in his hand, just going to work.
sentences.chinese: 巴巴木沙發坐着手裏拿着一個錐子，正在工作。

sentences.english: Please don't use that knife as a screwdriver.
sentences.chinese: 請不要把那把刀當錐子來用。

sentences.english: I used the awl with the broken handle.

definition: lit. cherry mouth (idiom)/fig. a delicate, ruby-lipped mouth
with dishevelled hair (idiom)/with one's hair down
to twitch/to throb/a spasm/to extract and use
